website_summaries.verdict: A well-designed and spacious beach tent that exceeds customer expectations.
pros: Not only do consumers love the smart and roomy design of this tent, it gets top marks for being easy to set up, and it's compact and lightweight
For occasional issues, users also report that the customer service is excellent
cons: Airflow could be improved as it tends to trap heat

website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best beach canopy on the market. You won't find one that's easier to set up with more space or a better design.
pros: Spacious, lightweight, and fairly easy to set up
Inside hooks and pockets for organizing
cons: Mesh windows allow limited airflow into the tent
Feels a bit shaky in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: ... tent and the smaller model and we are extremely happy with both
customer_reviews.text: We purchased both this tent and the smaller model and we are extremely happy with both. We plan to use this tent (XL) for the beach and the smaller tent for local fairs, festivals and airshows. I have attached a side-by-side comparison for your reference.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Shade!
customer_reviews.text: This tent exceeded my expectations! This tent shielded my entire family of 5! That's 3 children and 2 adults! My husband is 6 feet tall and he was able to sit comfortably inside. The shade from the tent also extended about another 3 feet out so it still covered the kids while playing in the sand! The set up and take down was very easy. The tent came with stakes to secure it from blowing away but you can also fill the side flaps attached to the tent with sand and have the same effect!
customer_reviews.author: Dom Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our recent vacation in Florida. The tent is very easy to set up, but I highly recommend having 2 people so that one can hold it so it doesn't blow away! Also, bring gallon sized ziplock bags and put the sand in those prior to putting in the pockets on the tent, it makes tear down so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: The stakes that come with it work great on the beach as well
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates most beach tents/umbrellas(this is our third purchase) because they are a pain and fly away in our Caribbean weather... However this is a total breeze to put up and take down by yourself. The stakes that come with it work great on the beach as well. We live in the Caribbean and our beaches are very sandy and the breeze is strong. This tent holds up great (we put the beach bag and cooler in the tent for extra weight), it's super roomy (three kiddies, bags and still room for mom to get in and nurse). You should purchase a beach mat as an add on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Danger!!! Broken fiberglass rod splinters are no joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Pacific Breeze, Please contact me. My family and I absolutely loved your product up until one of the fiberglass rods exploded. My wife now has fiberglass splinters in her hand. Can you please send a replacement rod with instructions on how to repair/replace the damaged rod? Thanks, Matt
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It was a nice tent, had great reviews
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice tent, had great reviews. Was able to use it once. Was getting things around for winter soni figured I'd open it for my son and clean it out. While cleaning the sand out in my house for my son to play in, and store for next summer of if the support post snaped out of no where. I take great pride in all my possessions. Read the instructions, no problems setting it up or taking it down, then the SECOND Time I open it. It breaks? It was not stored under anything. And it's passed the return window. Deeply disappointed and let down.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Paladino

customer_reviews.title: the setup is about as easy as it could get
customer_reviews.text: This was a a huge success for our week at the beach this year. Over the past number of years, members of our family have lost many canopies to the wind. However this was not the same story that we had with our Pacific Breeze product. The attached sand bags provide substantial stability and keep the canopy from being moved or tampered with by the wind. Another item to note, the setup is about as easy as it could get, you pull the string and it is setup! Hoping for many more years of good review with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Randall

customer_reviews.title: STRAPS BROKEN AFTER A YEAR IN STORAGE/ NO USAGE.
customer_reviews.text: first year we used was fantastic. Got the tent back out of storage for the 2nd time for this year's annual beach trip and the clips extending the top had completely disintegrated/ frayed off rendering that part unusable (see attached pic). Contacted customer service and I was 4 days off of their warranty so of course their only recourse was to offer to fix it- IF I paid for shipping to them. No. This thing cost 80 bucks to begin with.... I'm not wasting another 20 plus time to box it to have it fixed for it to probably break in a year again. I'd go with a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: XL size is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for a beach vacation we are taking so I haven’t used it outside but had to write a review already just based on testing the setup. This is exactly what I wanted. Make sure you get the XL if you want it 96 inches long, which is 16 inches longer than a twin XL bed. Also if you read the instructions it’s easy to setup in a snap. My husband tried without the instructions but one CI told him the order and trick with pulling both strings apart from each other and it was up in a jiffy. I hope it holds up to the wind but otherwise exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: TBrew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent for the beach with kids
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how amazing this tent was when we went on vacation. We have to pale children (one 3 and one 7 months. We were looking for something that was easy to set up/collapse and that would provide some privacy for me to feed our son. We also wanted something we could all semi fit in. This tent took all of a minute to put up and worked very well. I will say that at 5'2" it would have been hard for me to set up on my own, but my husband who is 5'11 had no trouble pulling the top up and locking it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Quality Questionable.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product when received. As I was enjoying sun protection on my first use, i started to notice these small holes in multiple places. See pictures. White dots are holes. I am going to ask for a replacement. If it’s still faulty, I suggest buyers be ware of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Needs Work
customer_reviews.text: Here in Hawaii on vacation and ordered this because of all the positive reviews. I also think it is a great product except for the fact that the one screen on the left window is damaged and looks like someone took their nails and dragged them all over it. The screen is all messed up. Besides that issue it’s a great product. Quality control needs to do better before shipping a product. With a new screen like the other two I would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a beach trip. It is REALLY easy to set up. I recommend taking gallon bags to fill with sand and put in the outside pockets as it makes cleanup easy. My only complaint is that it has ripped at the base, I suppose that is a stress point but I was hoping it had better sewing there. Also the bag has split. I expect we will be able to use it for another beach trip before it gets tossed. Also seems only to hold two of us unless we squeeze two small children in the back. Ventilation was good. Would buy again with an expectation of a short life.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to assemble. Wish it was thicker and the front closed
customer_reviews.text: This tent offers great sun protection at an affordable cost. It’s insanely easy to set up and take down, and it packs away nicely and is lightweight. It’s really easier to tote and assemble than a beach umbrella and offers better coverage. I kind of wish the material was thicker, I feel like a bit of light does filter through where it could have possibly offered darker shade. I also had been looking at the smaller version and thought this XL size would also offer the front closure option (for naps or diaper changes, etc) but the front of this one does not close shut.
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome!!!!! I took this tent to the beach this weekend and wondered where it had been all of my beach life. :-) I brought along my usual umbrella, just in case; however, we didn't need it. No more umbrellas! No more umbrellas blowing over or turning upwards due to the wind. Two beach chairs fit inside easily, along with all of our beach gear. Fabulous! And it was very easy to pitch and to take down. I don't write reviews, but this product deserves my five stars. Also, I LOVE the windows feature.
customer_reviews.author: Embrace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is SO much better than other pop up beach tents we’ve had! It’s just the right size that it’s not overwhelming to get up, but big enough to fit in comfortably. It seems sturdy to hold up in decent wind gusts. I haven’t used it yet to test the sun protection. Set up takes less than a minute. Take down takes about 3-4 minutes with the most difficult part putting it back in the bag. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Needs way more light blocking characteristics to be perfect
customer_reviews.text: We live right by the beach in San Diego and we go all the time. We were looking for good coverage, with lots of space for kids and stuff, and that could stand up to ocean winds. It met all of those requirements, but failed the sun test. Way too much light gets through the fabric that you have to squint and strain your eyes if you lay on your back inside. We lay a beach towel over the top and clothespin it on to block the sun. It works, but we shouldnt have to do that. Zippers on the side flaps instead to two toggles would've been better to keep the wind out.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: plus it easily fits into it's carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Super-simple setup and tear down, plus it easily fits into it's carry bag. I used the attached sandbags today at the beach and thought that was a simple, yet extremely useful feature. The tent didn't budge at all in the wind. I can't believe I've gone so long without something like this. The below picture is from my dining room when it came in the mail, as I forgot to take one today at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest tent I’ve ever used! My mom and I put it up in about 30 seconds, and filling the pockets with sand was the most time consuming. This tent is awesome and actually stayed standing through heavy wind on the beach and even through a storm! We were able to leave it on the beach almost all day unattended with no worries that it would blow away or fall. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MaryKate

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy set-up and STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was the BEST! We ordered the XL size. It opens in seconds and you just stake it into the sand and it doesn’t move. Ample room for the little kids to get some shade and relax, or even a few adults (with chairs). It’s lightweight and easy to carry as well. Take down takes maybe 1-2 min longer than set up, but still super easy. Folds down and you stick it in the carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chilexi

customer_reviews.title: Great beach shelter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Goes up and down in 15 sec.and easily fits back into the over sized storage bag. I bought this shelter to replace a smaller one that was a nightmare to set up and almost impossible to get back into the storage bag. Very stable in a breeze and great visibility with the 3 large windows. I had planned to buy an umbrella style shelter due to the ease of setup, but decided on the pacific breeze product after reading about how these umbrellas could turn inside out and self destruct in a high wind. The pacific breeze tent is also much more compact when collapsed than the umbrella style shelter. I highly recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: 4 years later we still love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this tent on our beach vacations, and we love it. It's big enough for the comings and goings of adults and kids during a day out of the beach. It's light, easy to carry, and easy to set up. It's blocks out a ton of rays and keeps you cool. The only drawback I can think of is that if you are flying with it, it's too big to fit in even the largest suitcase. You might have luck carrying it on, else you would have to check it. It's survived baggage check though, without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Easy Set Up, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item back in August of this year. As with most of my reviews I wait a few months and like to use it a number of times before posting a review. That said, I used it throughout the summer without issue. The size, quality, and set up is exactly as stated by the seller. At the beach it accommodates 2 low profile beach chairs, cooler, towels and a small fold up beach table with ease. Having two children they found it perfect to take a break from the sun and to hang out. Totally pleased with this purchase and would surely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D Genovese

customer_reviews.title: This beach tent really is amazing. I'm impressed how such a large tent can ...
customer_reviews.text: All the 5 star reviews are right. This beach tent really is amazing. I'm impressed how such a large tent can be folded in such a compact manner, and how light it is! The XL is huge, you can stretch out width-wise and fit fine (I'm 5'11"). Or you can put two beach chairs inside, along with coolers and beach bags, and enjoy the beach from the shade. The top pockets are useful for phone or kindle if you bring them to the beach. Overall amazing product, worthy of all the 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: StefanS

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Tent
customer_reviews.text: I was the envy of my family during a summer beach trip. They spent hours (I kid you not) setting up their very expensive tent on the beach. I unfortunately know because I was involved with the complicated process. That's not the say my tent wasn't up within minutes. My mother still speaks about how impressed she was with my tent. I have no regrets... I only with there were more color options.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: New tent was USED !
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this “new” in January for a beach trip in March. We decided to practice setting it up this past weekend. To our surprise, sand poured out of each of the pockets. This was clearly a “used” product, apparently returned and sold to us as “new”. We were deceived and will be reluctant to purchase other products.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Don't try it if you're short!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was very nice and had great reviews on multiple sites. However, I could not set it up by myself without standing on a stool. I am just under 5'2", so shorter than average, and I could not do it standing on the ground. It is important to me to be able to set up solo, so I had to send it back. I also found it to be a bit heavy and bulky in the carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shondra

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: The disassembled dimensions is no larger than your typical folding beach chair in its storage bag. I strap it down to the back of my jetski along with 2x beach chairs and it works perfectly. This is well designed, very manageable for a single person to set up even in a little wind and while I can't attest to durability quite yet it looks to be well made. Great value. I strongly recommend this canopy not because I have tried any of the others but because I could be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Cobelo

customer_reviews.title: Easily ripped unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: It was great and easy to set up and the window panels easily came up and down. Use the sand bags because with a strong wind it will flip on its back with just the plastic anchors. My biggest disappointment was that the fabric looked and felt sturdy but one toss of the sunscreen tube and it bounced into the wall immediately leaving a hole. Not sure how easy it can be patched I haven't tried yet, just disappointed it was that easy. So if you have a bunch of kids playing in there be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time last week. SO EASY to set up!! Read someone else’s review about using ziploc bags to make sand bags to hold it down... genius hack! Easy to take down as well but definitely need a second person when on a windy beach. HIGHLY recommend! As for space, we fit two adult camp/folding chairs inside and still had plenty of floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Glam_Mom79

customer_reviews.title: Easy tent to put up if there is no wind and doesn’t provide great shade.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this tent in my living room before taking it to the beach and it was so easy to put up. Putting it up at the beach however was very difficult. It was windy and the tent wouldn’t open bc the wind was blowing against it and when I finally got it open my son had to stand inside and hold the top down to keep it from flying away while I filled the sand bags. It doesn’t provide any shade when you are facing the sun. You basically have to turn it completely away from the sun to get shade. Disappointed for the amount of money I paid for it. Taking it down however was much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tent! Easy up and down for parents!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent! I am a mother of 3 Girls ages 7, 5 and 3! I needed something quick, easy, and painless!! This met all of my expectations and more!! The only thing that I would change is I wish that there were metal stakes to hold down the tent rather than plastic because it has blown a few Times but with lots of wind. I’ll prob just grab a few 1lb weights and put them in the corners because this tent is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after the third use
customer_reviews.text: After third use, it was impossible to open this tent however I tried. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Caught a lightning deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for the upcoming spring and summer season as I am fair skinned with two fair skinned boys. I did open it inside my home and was amazed at how easy it was to put up and take down. Also the tent is more than adequate for me and the two kids. I haven't had a chance yet to set it up outside but look forward to using it both at the beach and the sports field. I will post another review after the summer and finding out how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already! :)
customer_reviews.text: This is just what the Doctor ordered - literally! Being a beach and sun lover who has been bald for years, I have developed skin cancer on my scalp. Although, that has been treated, I must now be extra careful when going outdoors by wearing hats etc. This Pacific Breeze Easy-up shelter is perfect for me. It allows plenty of room inside allowing me to enjoy the outdoors while protecting me from the harmful UV rays of the sun. Relatively lightweight and sets up and packs quickly. Very satisfied with this purchase as recommended by my doctor!!!
customer_reviews.author: PapaFinnDaddy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and carry
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I have individually taken our son to the beach and carried this along with most everything else needed for a day at the beach by ourselves. We both found it easy to set up, with just a little practice needed to get that final lock in place at the top. We've also started bringing gallon ziploc bags to hold sand as holders rather than filling the pouches, just so we're not filling it full of sand to clear out each time. It works great, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product! We have a 3 year old and a 2 month old...so we have a lot to lug to the beach! The tent is lightweight and easy to carry. My husband and I were able to pop it up easily and secure it with the sandbags and stakes. My baby stayed in it during our first trip to the beach and I was easily able to nurse her in there with enough privacy. Take down was also easy with two people. On lookers were impressed and asking where I got it! It was a moderately windy day. Hoping it lasts us for years.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Turbitt

customer_reviews.title: So much better than an umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this thing is amazing! The set up/take down is so easy I can do it by myself. The tent is large enough (we got the XL) for a couple of adults and babies to be inside. Or put a blanket in front and have a larger area when the sun is behind you. I love that there aren’t poles to dig into the sand-just fill up the pockets with sand and you’re set. You can roll the window shades down and up for a breeze or extra sun protection. You literally pull chords and it pops into place. Then you push on two points and it folds down. So wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: VMar

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is SO easy to set up, which is the main reason I purchased it (based on other reviews). You can put the shades up if you want to keep the sun out, however if you leave them down, you get more of a breeze and don't feel like you're suffocating. It started to storm on the beach and we were able to fit 4 adults inside the tent but we were cramped up...in my opinion it fits 2 adults (comfortably) with bags, cooler, chairs, etc. I am also a softball mom so I plan on using this at tournaments. I highly recommend this for beach use!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few weeks ago, choosing it among models of similar sizes and features because of how good its reviews are, and the company's good customer service rep. We used it for the first time at the beach last week, and we were not at all disappointed. We should have gotten one much sooner. As a note, the first time we put it up, we got frustrated...because we were thinking it had to be more complicated than it was, so kept thinking we were doing it wrong. It's really, really simple. The next time we put it up in under a minute. A family member was so impressed with this tent that he's ordering one of his own.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I Payne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! We had a regular beach tent (with all the annoying poles and stakes) that was such a pain to set up and take down...when we were going to be spending a week straight at the ocean, I knew that was not going to work for us. I am SO glad I found this! So quick and easy!!! Used it every single day for a week straight and was raving about how great it was. Such great quality. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Received Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken when opened.. shame on us for waiting to open it until we got to the beach, missing the return window. The top, where all of the stakes come together, was broken. Thankfully my husband was able to tie it together to make it somewhat useable. Other than that it was easy to set up - bring a bucket to fill the sandbags, it will go faster. Provided good shade for our kids. You do need short beach chairs in order to sit inside of it on a chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: What a delight to own!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL version and set it up and took it down at home in about 2 minutes. Used it today , July 7, at Atlantic Beach, NC. Winds were a constant 18 to 20 knots. Took about 3 minutes to set up, including sand and stakes. It held up amazingly, as we watched umbrellas blow away. Very ample room for 3 adults and coolers. Took about 5 minutes to take down because of the winds and not wanting to damage it. Sand pockets were turned inside out to discard sand and it folded perfectly. Truly pleased and highly recommend this beach tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We broke one of the poles of this tent due to user error. Didn't follow the instructions when folding it up. Emailed the manufacturer to see if I could order a replacement pole. They weren't able to provide a replacement part, but sent me a new tent for FREE since it was still under warranty!!! Just got back from a week at the beach. Used the new tent everyday. Great product. Works best if you follow instructions ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: great for family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Great half tent. We have used it at the beach and the park and is great for my little one to get out of the sun (and eveyone else). Super light, easy to put up, and the sand bag spots really hold it down at the beach (we had an E-Z up that flew away with much less wind). I thought I put holes in it at one point when we had it at the beach on a stormy day (wind picking up chairs and flip flops) and I had to hold it down even with the sandbags before I gave up and put it away, but the next time i checked it was good to go
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all the way around
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. After spending years fighting with our Cabela's cabana I bought this because we needed a little more space. I wish I had bought it years ago. Everything about it is designed by somebody that actually uses it at the beach. It is super easy to setup, the large sand pockets hold it secure in the breeze, it folds up quick and easy and best of all it actually fits back in its storage bag. Hands down then best beach cabana I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic beach tent
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews, but this product is exceptional. Works exactly as indicated. Sets up in about 30 second and tears down in a minute. I use it on the beach in windy conditions in Venice Fl. No problems. The only issue is the plastic stakes. They are short and don't work that well in loose sand. I made my own out of 3/4 pvc pipe for about $8. As I said a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, but bring a friend for set-up
customer_reviews.text: This fits two easily or three close friends. In this size it's possible for one person to set it up, and remarkably easy for two. Once up, seems sturdy and highly efficient. Many clever design features such as the sand traps and the way the windows work. I haven't yet used it in sand enough to see if the mechanisms will gum up, but early indications are promising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is great! We bought this to use at the beach ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great! We bought this to use at the beach and it worked great! I was debating about whether to get the large or x-large and I am SOOO glad we went with the x-large!! Definitely wouldn't want it to be smaller. This was great for having shade, pretty easy to set up (although my husband did the set up and take down I didn't). I could fit a folding chair in it and still have plenty of room for coolers, relaxing, babies and kids. Definitely a keeper! And the it is very lightweight which was a HUGE plus for me! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Zeender

customer_reviews.title: This tent is awesome. Lightweight and easy for me to carry with ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. Lightweight and easy for me to carry with a beach bag and a toddler as well! Very easy for one person to set up and take down. Provides great shade and stays perfectly in place with the sand bags, even on a windy day. We've taken it to the beach a few times with our son and absolutely love it. We have the XL size tent and find it the perfect size for us. Fit 3 adults and 1 toddler easily. I saw someone else on the beach with the "large" size pacific breeze tent and it's much smaller. Can't wait to use my tent all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Beach Tent (About 2 minutes to setup)!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Beach tent. Very good quality and sturdy. The other type of beach tents we tried took forever to setup. This tent is named properly. Very easy to setup, about 2 minutes on a windy day at the beach. The poles and the tent are like one unit. I suggest to do a practice run in the back yard before you get to the beach. That way you will understand the unique design of this great beach tent. Also, you may want to add 2 thin ropes to the front corners of the opening to stabilize the opening. Fantastic Beach Tent (2 minutes to setup)!
customer_reviews.author: WASP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Liked the ease of setup and protection. can fit two beach chairs in it. One improvement, I would sew on sand pouches at the corners and a couple on the back to keep it from blowing away as the stakes were pretty much useless in sand. Folding up was just like every other tent like object once used it would not fit back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I would highly recommend for parents of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I would highly recommend for parents of babies/little children if you're planning to spend a day at the beach. It was easy to setup, break down. For the size of the text (which is very roomy), it breaks down into a surprisingly small size for carrying and packing. I saw the regular size one at the beach - and it didn't seem to have the air flaps that the XL has -- if you are on the fence I would choose XL over the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Quality is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible . I was so excited to purchase this and our second day on the beach the strings that attach all the pieces are very flimsy I don’t even think a pencil could be held with them. The sandbags already started ripping and the front popped off very disappointed for the amount of money for this .
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The handle on the carrying bag ripped off on day 6 of use. Not cool. Been using this at the Outer Banks on windy and calm days. I use four sand stakes which are longer than the ones supplied and hold the tent well. I did not feel like filling the bags with sand could be easier than just using a rubber mallet to tap in four stakes. As you can see in the photo I would not say this could accommodate 4 people.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: First, it's as easy to set up as advertised. We have another beach shelter that takes 15 minutes and is a pain to erect. This one? Like a minute. Really. We used it in a 15-20 mph wind and the stakes held. Didn't need to use the sandbags. Fit our full-size beach chairs and two adults with room to spare. I also like the capacious stuff sack. You don't have to pack the tent as tight as a sushi roll to get it in the sack. Overall, yes, we're pleased with the purchase. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J.

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: It made our trips to the park much better, especially with a small baby. She finally has a shaded area where she can nap and for her parents as well. It builds up and down in seconds, its super secure, and its easy to carry. It really is something that every family should have. My only regret is not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: BobBob

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 month old and we love going to the beach. Before I bought this I had the Colman sun shade ( which feels slightly sturdier) but it is a pain in the butt to set up. The Pacific breeze easy setup is a gift from a genius. It is EXTREMELY easy to set up. If your a parent this is a must have and if your not you should still buy this for those Beach days. Another great thing is how light it is compared to my colman sunshade. It make lugging it to the water from your care a breeze. (You see what I did there haha)
customer_reviews.author: A. Glaza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I've had this on my wish-list for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I've had this on my wish-list for two years and once this year's Prime Day came I finally pulled the trigger on purchasing. Well worth the money. We got the deluxe tent along with their loungers. It's nice to have a semi-private space at the beach to put your bags and belongings inside while you're in the water. Works so much better than just a beach umbrella. The tent is large and roomy, easy to assemble and put away. Dries quickly and sand doesn't cling to it. Very satisfied customer here!
customer_reviews.author: chhe lim

customer_reviews.title: Great option for shade
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is. I had a Coleman tent that had about the same coverage but it took about 15 minutes to put up and take down. This version took is lightweight and took about 5 minutes to put up, but I believe in the future it may take about 2-3 minutes tops. It is easier if you have two people But seems to be able to be done alone. It would fit 2 adults and 2 small kids comfortably. I paired it with a beach blanket and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! I've gotten many compliments about it and where I got it from. It provides great shade and sun protection. It's really easy to set-up, but I recommend two people doing it. Makes it much easier and quicker. It's also easy to tear it down and put it back in it's bag. I love how lightweight it is, too! This tent makes it so much easier to relax at the beach with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: NShell

customer_reviews.title: A must have for beach bum parents!
customer_reviews.text: We love this beach tent! It made our weekly trips to the beach in the summer comfortable for us & our baby. It’s easy to set up & take down & comes with stakes. The adjustable flaps make it nice for controlling the breeze and sun exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Shalyn

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great- worked better w a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to put up and take down. It definitely protects you from the sun, however, even with all the windows/vents open, you’ll need a breeze to keep cool in the harsh sun- otherwise it feels like an oven. Keep in mind we used this for the beach in FL- pretty hot there, and it worked well to get out of the sun but we needed to face it into the breeze to keep cool. The sandbags worked great keeping it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Smithsonite

customer_reviews.title: who loved it. So when I decided to visit in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a smaller, on person, tent as a gift for my brother in Florida, who loved it. So when I decided to visit in May I thought it would be a good idea to get something larger. So glad I did. The temps at the shore were in the mid to upper 80's with bright sun and this provided the needed shelter to keep us shaded when we wanted it. Easy set up and take down and very light weight to carry from the car, through the sand, to the beach. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: EmptyPockets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quiet in the breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Works great at the beach. The sand pockets are great for stabilizing the tent by filling them with sand or using them to put beach rocks on them for weight. The windows can be opened for ventilation and assist in reducing surface area when it is windy so air can flow through it instead of blowing it away. Sets up easily and packs up just as easy. Used it for an entire week at the beach with up to 25mph winds. The structure was strong and the fabric remained taut keeping the tent quiet ( no fabric flapping in the breeze making annoying noises ).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great size, fast setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the summer after getting tired of the regular beach umbrella coming lose. The XL size is perfect. 2 beach chairs can fit easily side by side inside the tent. Someone next to us had the reg size and it was too small. Setup is approx 2 minutes with two people. It has built in sand bags on the side and back if you need to weigh it down. The construction of the pieces look to be fairly flimsy so I am careful to make sure everything is fully extended before popping into place and have had no issues. I would purchase again. We use it once or twice a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This tent was amazing... It was easy to open, set up and close , based on other reviews I used extra large ziploc bags filled with sand for the sand pockets this made taking it down so easy. It held up well with the wind and was even able to keep out the rain when we had a sudden downpour on the beach all four of us (husband (big guy) , wife (average sized), teenager and a five year old were able to fit in it while the rain fell. On the hottest day 97 degrees it was not hot in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Debl7

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great! we used it at the beach and was so easy to assemble and sturdy. It was a pretty windy day and this tent never moved. There are screens for more ventilation as well as covers for shade. My daughter enjoyed playing in it for some time out of the sun. I would definitely recommend this product to everyone! If my daughter had let me I would have taken a nap...every time I closed my eyes I heard "Mommy wake up it's morning time"! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Our own private portable beach cabana!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I contemplated buying this tent for a while. All I have to say is that, this was WELL WORTH THE PURCHASE! My wife timed the setup at the beach and it was literally 4.5 minutes. So easy to setup and breakdown. Meanwhile, I see a couple struggling with their tent that requires pole assembly; it takes them a good 10-15 minutes to setup while their kids are running wild! Only thing I suggest is that you may need an extra beach umbrella if you want more shade in the front to block the varying angles of the sun. You also want a sheet/towel to extend beyond the initial floor mat included.
customer_reviews.author: Thelonious

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate beach shade! Easy to set up and take down (literally under 2 minutes), very compact packing for size, plenty of shade, easy to move after setup, sand bags instead of stakes are genius! Thoughtful features like window shades and mesh gear hammock! I'd give a star for each thing mentioned = 8 stars! Add an extra 2 stars for fantastic customer service as recently encountered during a phone call to the company about an issue we had with a tent pole. They responded quickly and resolved our problem! Few products meet and exceed functional expectations like the Pacific Breeze Deluxe XL Tent does and the customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: J&A G-fam

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Every year we try a new beach tent contraption and finally found a winner. There are tons of choices and frankly most of them are the same. Once you get them up they all will shield you from the sun. The difference here is this is easy to assemble in the wind and wont buckle after set up. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Set up and take down in under 5 minutes on first try. Used sand in the exterior pockets to hold it down. No problems with it moving or blowing away even though it was windy and multiple beach umbrellas were being taken away by the wind. Good amount of sun protection. We fit to low beach chairs inside as well as our bags and cooler and had plenty of room. We bought a small, foldable shovel to keep in the bag to put sand in the pockets quickly. Instructions are sewn to the storage bag - very smart. Easy and lightweight to carry in the bag. Fits in our Honda Accord trunk easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amber HK

customer_reviews.title: It's super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This worked flawlessly, even on some very windy days at the beach. I had to fill the achor bags on the side with sand, and even put sand on top of them, but it held strong. It's super easy to setup...just pull the strings and it springs into place. It helped me a great deal to get out of the hot sun for periods of time. It really does stay cool inside, with all the windows open. It was about 90 degrees outside, and easily a good 10-15 degrees cooler inside.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer047564

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: When they say easy set up, they really mean it. There is nothing not to like about this product. Read the size carefully, as it is really not all that big for two people and barely tall enough to clear your head when sitting in a regular chair. If you use this low-to-the-ground beach chairs, there is plenty of head room.
customer_reviews.author: Woody54

customer_reviews.title: Can vouch how easy to setup...
customer_reviews.text: But wish it had some better ventilation. This thing got hot on the beaches in Florida. The floor captures a ton of sand too. Almost wish it had some kinda way to easily dispose of the sand versus shaking this thing like crazy. I can actually fold it up and put in the travel bag easily though, which is rare for some tents.
customer_reviews.author: AWDV8

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this a couple of times now and feel that it was money well spent. Hubby usually grumbles at the beach but enjoyed getting out of the sun for awhile using this easy-to-put-up tent. It is lightweight, easily manageable and goes up in seconds. We had a chuckle watching other folks with their numerous poles and instructions with their tents. We recommend trying a few times at home to become comfortable with 'assembling' and 'disassembling' the tent; then you are good to go. The mesh windows are a great feature to get the breeze but cut back on the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rick & Rachel Benson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It literally pops up and comes down in seconds. Worth every penny. If it's really windy you may need an extra set of hands to help but otherwise awesome. We loved that it was also easy to move or rotate if needed because of suns position. The three windows make the tent very breezy and comfortable. The sand bags are great if you don't want to bother with the stakes. This worked well for two adults and two small children. Very lightweight. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spielbusch

customer_reviews.title: Trip Saver
customer_reviews.text: After having a lesser-quality product break within the first hour of the first beach use, I conducted some quick research and found that this was the highest reviewed of all of the non-canopy beach tents. There is a darn good reason as to why. The product is extremely light and very easy to carry in its bag. The easy up system was nearly flawless and passer-bys commented on its ingenuity. Using the long plastic stakes and filling up the sandbags the tent was very stable even in high winds. The product is slightly smaller than anticipated but that doesn't affect the final review of the product because of how successful of a purchase it was. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Reagin

customer_reviews.title: This tent was perfect for the family
customer_reviews.text: This tent was perfect for the family. Easy up and easy down. Once folded back up, it fits right back in the carrying bag easily, not like most anything else that you try to put away. The pockets are perfect for holding cell phones or tablets, but are sturdy enough to hold more weight. Plus, the tent looks really nice. I'm really happy that I went with the XL version. I'm 6'2 and about 225 so I take up a good bit of the room inside. More than two adults would be too cramped, in my opinion. If they made an XXL version, I would probably go with it. Definite recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good beach investment
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great product! Me and my wife really like it! Putting it away is a bit tricky but nothing too crazy. The quay feels good, I had one of the “windows” the elastic band broke. I fixed it and sowed it so it won’t come off ever again but other than that it’s really spacious and does exactly what it’s suppose to do
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach tent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Two adults and a baby fit perfectly in here. Provides ample shade and a nice breeze with the vented windows. Used at the beach temp as high as 80 degrees. Glad we got the xl. Simple to carry and setup. Everyone asks where we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: J Muger

customer_reviews.title: Great little beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beach shelter! I appreciate the instructions sewn into the carrying bag, even though we did a trial set up at home before our beach trip. Stake the corners, lock the front legs, and lift the center! Done! In windy conditions one has the option of filling the sand pockets for added protection. It stayed in place with 25 mile per hour wind! We also like the closable flaps on the sides and back and the large pocket near the top. It’s easy to get to. It sheltered two of us comfortably on two folding beach chairs along with other assorted gear. At 6 lbs, it’s a breeze to carry to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on the smaller version, I got the XLG and even that is just enough room for two beach chairs. Anymore than that...not enough space. The cooler and beach bag fit great as well....but it's not as large as you would think. I go to the beach by myself often and it is so easy to pop up and pop down....I have no trouble at all. I only had to put sand in the pockets one time because of an extra windy day at the beach. Everyone's beach umbrellas were blowing around or down and this sun tent just stayed down perfectly. It is very light weight, less than the beach chair I caarry. Great purchase....So Happy!
customer_reviews.author: MLD22

customer_reviews.title: Used it 2 times during our recent beach vacation and it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used it 2 times during our recent beach vacation and it worked perfectly. I saw so many inferior products at the beach with folks spending 20 minutes or more trying to get them set up. The Pacific Breeze popped open in 2 minutes. We used gallon zip lock bags filled with wet sand to insert into the pockets to hold it in place. Worked great even in a stiff ocean breeze. Our beach chairs did not even tear or damage the ground cover piece. VERY WELL MADE. FIVE stars
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Breeze is High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely perfect for three adults on the sunny beach of Pensacola Beach! It took only my husband and I only seconds to put up and take down. The side windows are easy to put down or roll up and provides plenty of breeze flow. The floor is sturdy and there are outside pockets to fill with sand to keep the tent in place in case of strong wind. This Pacific Breeze Tent is the best! I only wish we would of had this fantastic product when we had lived on both the east and the west coast years ago! Thank you Pacific Breeze for making our sun filled vacation the best ever!
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Breeze  Easy Up  Beach Tent
customer_reviews.text: Just as reviewed by others this is the fastest and most simple beach tent to set up. Winds are very strong on St Augustine beaches and the 5 sand bag attached holder's worked well to secure the tent. So simple to take down. This is an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! I had a leg injury but we were about to go on vacation to the beach. I needed something I could relax in and stay out of the sun without getting sand in my bandage. This was the perfect solution! It was so easy to put up and put away when we were done! Friends that were with us were also impressed and talked about getting it too.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: best thing EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest thing I have ever put together. I cant imagine a beach trip without it. And it is so light i can throw it and a beach chair on my shoulder and ride a bike to the beach access. This tent is so good! And plenty of room for two adults. Cohld get three in there but it'd be tight
customer_reviews.author: Dbs0003

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing put up and takes down like a dream! It was set up in less than a minute, and stored back up in it's storage bag in the same amount of time. Very roomy and sturdy exactly what I was looking for. I can not WAIT to take it to the beach with my fair skinned baby.
customer_reviews.author: AJacks

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Superb Beach Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Superb product! Easy set-up and stable in 20 mph winds on the beach with gusts to 25 mph (tent did not even flinch!). You dont even need stakes as the pockets which you can put sand into hold down the tent superbly and it is so easy to put sand in the pockets and remove the sand. The tent went up in minutes, is made of quality materials, and is easy to take down (less time). This is my 3rd beach tent over the past 10 years and this one is by far the best one that I have ever had. If Pacific Breeze made fully enclosed tents, I would buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Grad

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to get this tent for our beach trip
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this tent for our beach trip. I opened it up and practiced before heading to the beach. It’s fairly simple to open, it has a lot of space and worked great for our needs. I gave it a 3 however because when I opened it up at the beach the little piece that was sewn on at the top wasn’t sewn on good and came apart. The top part of the tent kept coming off and I had to keep trying to hold it with a safety pin. I wish those pieces were sewn more secure, but other than that I love this tent so much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley massengale

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: Just spent 2 weeks on RI beaches with this tent. Awesome purchase. Really happy I got the XL size. The little additional head room and 3 windows really made a difference. Also, the suggestion to put sand into large Ziplock bags (rather than directly into the sand sacks) really made for a cleaner and quicker take down. All observers couldn't believe how easy tent was to set up and break down.
customer_reviews.author: James L Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent!
customer_reviews.text: I read countless reviews before deciding to order from Pacific Breeze. This is a company who makes good on what they claim & I read their Customer Service is excellent as well. The tent goes up & down just as easily as everyone says, though it's much easier with 2 people, 1 person works quite nicely, I know! The quality is very good. Details like the tent windows, tent stakes, sand pockets, directions attached inside carrier bag & ease of rolling up to return to carrier make this product a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and take down. Questionable stability in strong wind.
customer_reviews.text: This was so incredibly easy to set up and take down. I was able to do it myself. It was roomy enough for 2 adults and a 2 year old and all our gear. It was very windy in the afternoon and the wind was coming through the front opening And the tent was lifting up and swaying even though we had secured it with ziploc bags of rocks (much less messy than sand). I took it down because I was concerned the poles would bend. I could have turned the front away from the wind but then we would have been in direct sunlight. Other than that it is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ellen Askew

customer_reviews.title: What were they thinking???!
customer_reviews.text: Worst design EVER!!! I wanted a sun tent so I could take my grandsons to the beach and be cozy and out of the sun and bugs. There's NO WAY I can put this up by myself! The middle connection is not only impossible for me to push together, it's not even aligned correctly! To say I'm disappointed is an understatement. I'm sending this back and buying a different brand. I have an actual tent that i had no problem at all putting up, so I do know what I'm doing, but this design is nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Drumlin

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy another brand!
customer_reviews.text: With a large family and little ones that need shade, this was perfect. So quick to get up and you don’t have to mess with stakes and hope wind doesn’t pick it up! We used it close to shore at the beach and there are sand bags all along the outside to weight it down, there are openings with mesh to allow airflow and pouches inside to hold your items so they’re not left to the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Eddy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT - my husband doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: After two trips to the beach - I have to say that I LOVE this thing - however, my husband who is 6'6" does not. (I am 5'3"). My chair backs up to it and I fit under it just fine. My husband not so much. That said - just use the included sandbags and it DOES NOT blow away. It doesn't blow down. It really does go up easily. WAtch the video on the amazon page. Just make sure it is tied good. Its not too huge to carry out to the beach and not to heavy either. I've had so many people come up and ask where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Spraker

customer_reviews.title: I've only used this once but I LOVED it! This was the first tent I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once but I LOVED it! This was the first tent I've ever bought so I don't have anything to compare it to. It was easy to set up, I did it by myself, it is very lightweight, and easy to put away. I had people ask me where I got it bc of how easily I set it up. It fit three people and maybe could fit another if it weren't for all the beach bags I packed.
customer_reviews.author: SandraD

customer_reviews.title: Beach tent is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This beach tent is easy to set up and easy to take down and fold up. It is vey lightweight and easy to carry. However, this tent will not stay standing on a windy day at the beach. I'm also concerned on the quality of the stitching. I have a feeling that the seams may come apart after a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: best tent for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: This tent is amazing. Set up is soo easy. And it did us justice against the sun. It was the perfect size..and it kept us cool with its mesh windows. The pockets for the sand bags were awesome and held the tent against the string breezes that came through once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: ImanWithAnE

product_meta.title: Pacific Breeze Easy Setup Beach Tent Deluxe XL
feature_bullets: Specially designed hub system showcases industry leading design. Allows for fast and easy setup

The Deluxe XL version is lightweight and compact, weighing just over 6 pounds and folding down to a travel size of 38 L x 6 W x 6 H. The beach tent provides protection from the sun, rain and wind for all outdoor activities, UPF 50+ sun protection and 3 X-large windows for ventilation. The beach tent is made from breathable polyester and is water repellent

The tent is 95 L x 52 H x 51 D, providing a spacious interior shelter that comfortably fits 3-4 people. The beach tent has internal pockets to store personal items and hooks for hanging. It is made of a durable and lightweight fiberglass frame and water resistant PE floor makes our Beach Tent a great outdoor accessory
Includes a carrying case, 5 sand pockets for added stability in windy conditions, and 4 stakes
Pacific Breeze's customer friendly 1 year warranty. Call or email any time for support!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
